MajorClaims.MC1: Money should spend on facilities in school or update resources, which are beneficial to school rather than just instructors
MajorClaims.MC2: I against providing more money to professors

Claims.C2: the school should put more emphasis on students instead of professors
Claims.C3: To improve education, spending more money to raise professors' salary is inappropriate
Claims.C4: Students' tuition is not only for the professors but also for their quality of learning at university

Premises.P1: the schools are established for students
Premises.P2: the most efficient way to improve the education is to guide the students to learn actively
Premises.P3: By renewing some facilities in school so students will spend more time at school doing assignment
Premises.P4: A comfortable environment can attract people to stay longer
Premises.P5: students spend more time on school to make a good circulation of learning
Premises.P6: students have a better environment to working on their assignments
Premises.P7: the quality of their assignments will improve
Premises.P8: the competition between peers enhances and forms a circulation
Premises.P9: In my school, the classrooms in my university are old and kind of shabby
Premises.P10: I prefer spending money in a coffee shop to staying at school to finish my assignment
Premises.P11: It's unpleasant to stay at school
Premises.P12: coffee shops are not always quiet, so my classmates and I often finish our work roughly
Premises.P13: the ultimate purpose is to change, to motivate students to be better
Premises.P14: High-salary instructors don't teach students harder because they earn more money
Premises.P15: There won't be any effect if school does so
Premises.P16: There was news about raising professors' salary in my country
Premises.P17: This event provoked a demonstration composing of students mostly
Premises.P18: The proposal of the demonstration was eliminating the raising salaries
Premises.P19: if the policy of raising salary was supported, the demonstration would not happen
